text: Jikheun bak Rasul teuma le kaphe Gata meuuse jinoe le bagah Meupeuteubiet teuh lam nanggroe kamoe Atawa tawoe bak kamoe seumah Tawoe lom ubak agama kamoe Tuhan kheun meunoe teuma Neupeugah s Ubak dum rasul Neupeutron wahi Tanggoh kamoe bri keu jih ka leupah Jinoe jih bandum meupeubinasa Kawom elanya lalem that leupah
